      • convert

        public double convert(double amount,
                      java.lang.String fromCurrency,
                      java.lang.String toCurrency)
        Convert amount from one currency to another
        参数:
        amount - amount to convert
        fromCurrency - source currency (USD/EUR/GBP/AUD)
        toCurrency - target currency (USD/EUR/GBP/AUD)
        返回:
        converted amount

      • getSupportedCurrencies

        public java.lang.String[] getSupportedCurrencies()
        Get all supported currencies
        返回:
        array of currency codes

      • getExchangeRate

        public double getExchangeRate(java.lang.String fromCurrency,
                              java.lang.String toCurrency)
        Get exchange rate between two currencies
        参数:
        fromCurrency - source currency
        toCurrency - target currency
        返回:
        exchange rate

      • roundToTwoDecimals

        public double roundToTwoDecimals(double value)
        Round a double value to two decimal places using standard rounding
        参数:
        value - the value to round
        返回:
        rounded value
